alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Finney; Ness; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 28 at 3:07PM CDT until March 29 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS TUESDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 031...045...063 AND 074... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM to 10 PM CDT Tuesday. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 031 Ellis...Fire Weather Zone 045 Ness...Fire Weather Zone 063 Finney and Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton. * Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Timing...Tuesday Afternoon and Evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent. * Temperatures...Upper 70s to lower 80s. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
